name: Delicious Grainfruit Wrap
desc: A staple food wrapped in big leaves. The light fragrance of Grainfruit rises up from the soft, velvety filling within. As it melts in your mouth, its sweet and spicy notes combine with a touch of saltiness, resulting in a gustatory experience that is nothing short of sumptuously rich.

value.text: Increases all party members' DEF by 126 for 30s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

customize.name: Recipe: Grainfruit Wrap
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Grainfruit Wrap.

customize.name: Grainfruit Wrap
customize.desc: A staple food wrapped in big leaves. There's a simple saying in Natlan that goes like this: "A leaf to wrap your Grainfruit with will always fall." It's used to express the idea of things being fated to happen.

customize.name: Suspicious Grainfruit Wrap
customize.desc: A staple food wrapped in big leaves. It basically tastes the same as biting into raw Grainfruit, begging the question of what the purpose of cooking it was...

customize.name: Delicious Grainfruit Wrap
customize.desc: A staple food wrapped in big leaves. The light fragrance of Grainfruit rises up from the soft, velvety filling within. As it melts in your mouth, its sweet and spicy notes combine with a touch of saltiness, resulting in a gustatory experience that is nothing short of sumptuously rich.

customize.name: Grainfruit
customize.desc: This plant is named after the giant grains that grow along the cob.

customize.name: Fowl
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.
